DOC.brief_summary: The Medical Therapy Prostatic Symptoms ( MTOPS ) clinical research study sponsor National Institutes Health ( NIH ) . The study test whether oral drug finasteride ( Proscar ) doxazosin ( Cardura ) , alone together , delay prevent worsen symptom men Benign Prostatic Hyperplasia ( BPH ) . MTOPS large long study simultaneously test whether drug delay prevent clinical progression ( symptom worsen ) BPH . Seventeen U.S. medical center recruit 2,931 men diagnose symptomatic BPH December 1995 March 1998 . Study doctor continue follow men November 2001 quarterly basis . In addition clinical progression BPH , MTOPS include evaluation prostate volume ultrasound , prostate biopsy among subgroup volunteer , quality life .
